Review Name: Terrific Review Description: Purchased this 1.5 ton 3 star Voltas window Ac through flipkart at a very reasonable price. It cools the room within minutes at even 24 degree. At this price it is the best window Ac. I was a bit confused when read about the noise level given in the comments, but it's nothing like that. You can have a very pleasant sleep using this window Ac. Person who came for installation were very polite and supportive. Even during this critical lockdown time, people from Voltas took proper follow-ups untill the AC got installed. Worth buying it. Thankyou flipkart ! Thankyou Voltas !
